message: A MUST READ if you are picking a JS framework ... This guy said everything I hate about AngularJS and love about Backbone.js!
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: all these compasisons just to say, let's use AmpersandJS

Albeit the pros and cons of each are stated clearly, including their in-house solution. But just to add insult to the injury (because it's fun sometimes, duh!)

AmpersandJS: A highly modular, loosely coupled, non-frameworky framework for building advanced JavaScript apps.
Is the single most juiciest bullshit buzz-soaked statement I've read this week and it sure looks like a long one.
